name: CodeAcross Sacramento 2014
tagline: find info on activities, get updates & more
body:
### CodeAcross Sacramento 2014 is Saturday, February 22, 2014!!!

Code for America and Sunlight Foundation have developed ideas activities. Which do we like? Want to work on one of them? All of them?


## The Open Data Inventory
__Take stock of where your city stands on publishing some fundamental datasets.
See CfA google doc [here].(https://docs.google.com/a/codeforamerica.org/document/d/1LFEwoVYWrTFM4gb9iKjMlI9n_MF7lDBeD7clsYGYbvo/edit).

## Open Data Policy
__Work with your local officials to create an open data policy, or draft an implementation plan or accountability structure for a recently passed policy.
See CfA google doc [here].(https://docs.google.com/a/codeforamerica.org/document/d/1ZP_qNd6Zf_AmGff3yXT91vnUlOPkXLDb6zFFH75A5h8/edit):


## Open Civic Data Scraper
__Create scrapers to pull down important civic information to feed the Open Civic Data API.
see CfA google doc [here](https://docs.google.com/a/codeforamerica.org/document/d/1mf_7M4uiWYM0npdRpk1FxzcWBMh3jUwAIloOZCmao1k/edit).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
